traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The anhkolox doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The anhkolox makes two Claw attacks and one Entrapping Rend attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet in a horizontal direction of the anhkolox's choice.

actions.name: Entrapping Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 23 (5d6 + 6) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or be trapped in the anhkolox's rib cage and grappled (escape 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the anhkolox can't use Entrapping Rend on another target.

monsters.name: Aurak Draconian

traits.name: Aura of Command
traits.desc: The draconian radiates a commanding presence in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. A draconian in the aura that can see or hear the aurak can't be charmed and has advantage on saving throws made to avoid or end the frightened condition on itself.

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its magical essence lashes out as a ball of lightning at the closest creature within 30 feet of it before arcing out to up to two other creatures within 15 feet of the first. Each creature must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draconian makes three Rend or Energy Ray attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d12 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Energy Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Noxious Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The draconian exhales a 15-foot cone of noxious gas. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 21 (6d6) poison damage and gains 1 level of exhaustion. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, doesn't gain exhaustion, and is immune to all draconians' Noxious Breath for 24 hours.

spells: The draconian casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 14):

traits.name: Controlled Fall
traits.desc: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage.

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its body turns to stone and releases a petrifying gas. Each creature within 5 feet of the draconian must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or be restrained as it begins to turn to stone. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends; otherwise the creature is petrified for 1 minute. After 1 minute, the body of the draconian crumbles to dust.

traits.name: Draconic Devotion
traits.desc: While the draconian can see a Dragon that isn't hostile to it, the draconian has advantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draconian makes two Shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Bozak Draconian

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its scales and flesh immediately shrivel away, and then its bones explode. Each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 9 (2d8) force damage.

traits.name: Glide
traits.desc: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage, and it can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draconian makes two Trident melee attacks or two Lightning Discharge attacks.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Lightning Discharge
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) lightning damage.

spells: The draconian casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save 12):

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, it dissolves into acid that splashes on those around it. Each creature within 5 feet of the draconian must succeed on a 12 Dexterity saving throw or be covered in acid for 1 minute. A creature covered in the acid takes 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can use its action to scrape or wash the acid off itself or another creature.

traits.name: Glide
traits.desc: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage, and it can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be infected with a disease—a minuscule slaad egg.
A Humanoid host can carry only one slaad egg at a time. Over three months, the egg moves to the chest cavity, gestates, and forms a slaad tadpole. In the 24-hour period before the tadpole is born, the host feels unwell; its speed is halved; and it has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. At birth, the tadpole chews its way through vital organs and out of the host's chest in 1 round, killing the host in the process.
If the disease is cured before the tadpole's emergence, the tadpole disintegrates.

monsters.name: Dragon Army Dragonnel
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 13
monsters.languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The dragonnel doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragonnel makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

traits.name: Draconic Devotion
traits.desc: While the officer can see a Dragon that isn't hostile to it, the officer has advantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The officer makes two Vicious Lance attacks and uses Assault Orders if it's available.

actions.name: Vicious Lance
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) fire damage.

actions.name: Assault Orders (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The officer shouts orders and targets up to two other creatures within 60 feet of itself. If a target has the Draconic Devotion trait and can hear the officer, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack.

traits.name: Draconic Devotion
traits.desc: While the soldier can see a Dragon that isn't hostile to it, the soldier has advantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The soldier makes two Longsword or Javelin attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

monsters.name: Greater Death Dragon
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 17

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The dragon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the dragon can't bite a different target.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Cataclysmic Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a wave of ghostly purple flames in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature dies if the breath reduces it to 0 hit points. Additionally, any Medium or smaller Humanoid killed by the breath's damage, as well as every corpse of such a creature within the cone, becomes a zombie (see the Monster Manual) under the dragon's control. The zombie acts on the dragon's initiative but immediately after the dragon's turn. Absent any other command, the zombie tries to kill any non-Undead creature it encounters.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cataclysmic Rush (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon moves up to half its flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks, carrying with it any creatures it is grappling. During this move, if it enters the space of a Medium or smaller creature, that creature takes 4 (1d8) necrotic damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

monsters.name: Istarian Drone
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10
monsters.languages: understands the languages spoken by its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The drone can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The drone doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The drone makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) lightning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 15). The drone has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

actions.name: Crystalline Spit (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The drone spits crackling gel in a line 5 feet wide and 20 feet long. Each creature in the line must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 (4d6) lightning damage and is restrained by the gel, which hardens into crystal. The creature is restrained until the crystal is destroyed. The crystal has AC 15, 15 hit points, immunity to poison and psychic damage, and vulnerability to thunder damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't restrained.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The soldier makes two Longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

reactions.name: Hold the Line
reactions.desc: If an ally within 5 feet of the soldier must make a saving throw, the soldier encourages the ally, granting advantage on the roll.

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, it dissolves into acid that splashes on those around it. Each creature within 5 feet of the draconian must succeed on a 12 Dexterity saving throw or be covered in acid for 1 minute. A creature covered in the acid takes 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can use its action to scrape or wash the acid off itself or another creature.

traits.name: Glide
traits.desc: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage, and it can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draconian makes two Dagger attacks. If both attacks hit the same creature, the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned until the end of the target's next turn. While poisoned in this way, the target is also paralyzed.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Hoopak
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 40/160 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage if the kender used the hoopak's sling to make a ranged attack.

actions.name: Taunt
actions.desc: The kender launches a barrage of insults at a creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. If the target can hear the kender, the target must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Elusive
bonus_actions.desc: The kender takes the Disengage or Hide action.

monsters.name: Lesser Death Dragon
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14
monsters.languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The dragon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The dragon has two claws, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Cataclysmic Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a wave of ghostly purple flames in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature dies if the breath reduces it to 0 hit points. Additionally, any Medium or smaller Humanoid killed by the breath's damage, as well as every corpse of such a creatures within the cone, becomes a zombie (see the Monster Manual) under the dragon's control. The zombie acts on the dragon's initiative but immediately after the dragon's turn. Absent any other command, the zombie tries to kill any non-Undead creature it encounters.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.desc: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The scout has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

traits.name: Child of the Sea
traits.desc: The scout can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points by a creature that is Large or smaller, the draconian crumbles into dust that then forms a spectral, shrieking image of the creature that killed it. The image lasts for 1 minute. Each creature hostile to the draconian within 10 feet of the image must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the spectral image for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draconian makes two Serrated Sword attacks and one Tail attack.

actions.name: Serrated Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

reactions.name: Shape Theft
reactions.desc: After the draconian kills a Medium or smaller Humanoid, the draconian magically cloaks itself in an illusion to look and feel like that creature while retaining the draconian's game statistics (other than its size). This transformation lasts until the draconian dies or uses a bonus action to end it.

monsters.name: Skeletal Knight
monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the skeletal knight to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is bludgeoning or from a critical hit. On a success, the skeletal knight drops to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The skeletal knight doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skeletal knight makes three Enervating Blade or Throwing Axe attacks in any combination.

actions.name: Enervating Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the skeletal knight's next turn.

actions.name: Throwing Axe
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Wasteland Dragonnel
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 13
monsters.languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The dragonnel doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragonnel makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Acid Spit
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 20 (5d6 + 3) acid damage.
